about_the_game:
24 looping tracks with electronic and retro vibes! The perfect pack for sci-fi metroidvania games, 8 and 16 bit cyberpunk and any other kinds of digital or technology heavy world designs!

Features:

* 24 royalty free songs
* mP3 M4A OGG and WAV formats

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games

Track list:

A Midnight Walk on Planet Kelstar
Action Phase
Alien Vents
An Adventure in the Future
An Easy Flight
Attack On CyberCity
Bit-Lord
Broken Fragment
CyberCafe
ElectroFest
Futuristic Science Dungeon
Giant Robot T-Rex Battle
Groove Dungeon
Grooves That Kill
Laboratory Theme
Modern Futuristic City
More Than A Pixel
Nav-Boss
Project Tethys
Puzzle Battle
Space Dance
Star Dance
Star Eyes and Glimmer
Sweet Sunday Grove

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: Does your game have a retro vibe and is set in the future? Then this pack is just what you need to add a great soundtrack to it! With 24 amazing brand new chiptune tracks you have nearly every possible situation covered.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
